name: BitSpirit
description: BitSpirit is a BT downloader featured with multi-task download, breakpoint resumption, super seed mode, data compression and transmission and others. Meanwhile excellent caching technology has been adapted to better protect hard disk. Different connect strategies are used for different network types and methods to better utilize network resources.

en_US.description: BitSpirit is a BT downloader featured with multi-task download, breakpoint resumption, super seed mode, data compression and transmission and others. Meanwhile excellent caching technology has been adapted to better protect hard disk. Different connect strategies are used for different network types and methods to better utilize network resources.
en_US.name: BitSpirit

zh_CN.description: 比特精灵是一款BT下载软件，它支持多任务下载、断点续传、超级种子模式、数据压缩传输等功能，同时采用优秀的磁盘缓存技术，更好地保护硬盘，对不同的网络类型和上网方式实行不同的连接策略，更好地利用网络资源。
zh_CN.name: 比特精灵
